name: GoodFolk
tagline: Discover. Design. Develop. Deploy. Do Good.
description:
Work Hard, Give Hard. That's our mission.
From websites for local businesses to custom web apps serving millions of customers, we plan, design, develop, and promote beautiful & intelligent digital products. We spend 90% of our time designing and building amazing digital products for some of the world’s top brands. For the other 10%, we use our superpowers to help the causes we care about.
We take the time to understand each client’s challenges, and then present a solution that is uniquely suited to them. Maybe you need to get a simple WordPress website up as fast as possible so that you can start selling your services. Maybe you need a complete overhaul of your existing brand and online presence. Or maybe you just need someone to help drive traffic to your website through intelligent SEO & SEM strategies.
We also believe that being a world-class digital agency means that we have a responsibility to make the world a better place. We’re also firm believers that when you talk the talk, you’ve also got to walk the walk. that means that every other Friday is a GoodFolk Friday - we don’t do any client work and we just focus on projects for our charitable partners. We come together as a company to work on one larger project (usually lasting a year or longer, such as a website redesign or building an app) and various smaller projects for causes we believe in. And there’s usually some pizza involved.
READ MORE...
